abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed third poverty reduction
            support operation is intended to continue to support the
            Government of Georgia in the implementation of policy
            reforms in the areas of: strengthening public sector
            accountability, efficiency, and transparency; improving
            electricity and gas sector services; improving the
            environment for private sector development; and improving
            social protection, education and health care services. It
            will be made available once agreed triggers of policy and
            institutional reform are satisfied. This project will be
            followed by a fourth operation, which will close out this program.
